examples.translation: 他们对自己的养老金问题显得十分焦虑。
examples.first: They show great anxiety concerning their retirement

examples.translation: 她父亲不再给她零用钱了.
examples.first: Her father cut off (ie stopped paying) her

v: put on a fixed allowance, as of food
n: an amount allowed or granted (as during a given period)
a sum granted as reimbursement for expenses
an amount added or deducted on the basis of qualifying circumstances
